products.name: Mobile Legends: Adventure
products.shortDescription: M-CASH Top Up for Mobile Legends: Adventure
products.description: Mobile Legends: Adventure (MLA) is a casual idle RPG perfect for busy players. Collect over 100 unique heroes, go on an exciting journey, and help save the Land of Dawn from danger. Idle & Auto Battles - Your heroes fight on their own and collect resources even when you're not playing. Easy Leveling - Quickly level up new heroes using level sharing and transfer features. Strategic Battles - Create smart team lineups to defeat tough bosses and players.
howToTopUp: Select the M-CASH denomination you want
M-CASH will be credited to your account instantly
howToFindPlayerId: Your Player ID will be displayed on your profile

products.name: Mobile Legends (Brazil)
products.shortDescription: Diamond Top Up for Mobile Legends Brazil Server
products.description: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang Diamonds is the premium in-game currency for the Brazil server. Use Diamonds to purchase heroes, skins, emotes, and other cosmetic items. Diamonds can also be used for hero trial cards and battle points (BP) conversion. Get instant delivery of diamonds to dominate the Land of Dawn!
howToTopUp: Select the Diamond package you want
Enter your User ID and Zone ID
howToFindPlayerId: User ID and Zone ID will be displayed

products.name: Mobile Legends (Russia)
products.shortDescription: Diamond Top Up for Mobile Legends Russia Server
products.description: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang Diamonds for Russia server. Purchase heroes, skins, emotes, and exclusive cosmetic items. Diamonds enable you to unlock hero trial cards, convert to battle points, and access premium content. Fast and secure delivery to your Russian Mobile Legends account.
howToTopUp: Enter your User ID and Zone ID
howToFindPlayerId: View User ID and Zone ID on profile page

products.name: Mobile Legends (Philippines)
products.shortDescription: Diamond Top Up for Mobile Legends Philippines Server
products.description: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang Diamonds for Philippines server. Unlock heroes, exclusive skins, emotes, and premium features. Use Diamonds for battle pass upgrades, hero trials, and BP conversion. Instant delivery to your Philippine Mobile Legends account with 100% security.
howToTopUp: Enter User ID and Zone ID
howToFindPlayerId: User ID and Zone ID displayed on profile

products.name: Mobile Legends (Global)
products.shortDescription: Diamond Top Up for Mobile Legends Global Server
products.description: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang Global server Diamond top-up. Purchase heroes, skins, emotes, and cosmetic items with instant delivery. Unlock hero trial cards, battle pass upgrades, and convert to battle points. The most popular MOBA game with millions of players worldwide. Secure and fast delivery guaranteed.
howToTopUp: Enter your User ID and Zone ID
Diamonds credited instantly to your account
howToFindPlayerId: Your User ID and Zone ID are displayed

products.name: Honor of Kings
products.shortDescription: Token Top Up for Honor of Kings
products.description: Honor of Kings Tokens are the game's premium currency for the world's most-played mobile MOBA. Use Tokens to acquire exclusive items, heroes, skins, and other premium content. Engage in 5v5 battles with legendary heroes from mythological lore. Fast delivery within 30 minutes. Join millions of players worldwide in this action-packed strategy game.
howToTopUp: Tokens will be credited within 30 minutes
howToFindPlayerId: Click your Avatar and enter personal Homepage
Expand the setting on top right
Select view UID - Your Player ID will be displayed

products.name: PUBG: New State
products.shortDescription: NC (NewState Cash) Top Up for PUBG: New State
products.description: PUBG: New State NC (NewState Cash) is the premium currency for PUBG: New State. Set in 2051, experience the next generation battle royale with futuristic weapons, vehicles, and gameplay mechanics. Use NC to purchase exclusive skins, weapon upgrades, and battle passes. Instant delivery to your PUBG: New State account.
howToTopUp: Enter your PUBG: New State Player ID
NC will be added to your account instantly
howToFindPlayerId: Your Player ID is displayed on the profile screen

products.name: PUBG Mobile (Global)
products.shortDescription: Unknown Cash (UC) Top Up for PUBG Mobile Global
products.description: PUBG Mobile Unknown Cash (UC) is the premium in-game currency for the world's most popular battle royale. Use UC to purchase Royal Pass, Elite Pass Plus, exclusive skins, weapon finishes, emotes, and more. Experience intense 100-player battles, multiple game modes including Classic, Payload, and Arena. Fast and reliable delivery with 24/7 support.
howToTopUp: Enter your PUBG Mobile Player ID
UC credited to your account within 30 minutes
howToFindPlayerId: Your Player ID is displayed at the top
